network-error: We're having trouble connecting to the server. Please check your internet connection or try again later.
timeout-error: The server is taking too long to respond. This might be due to a slow internet connection. Please try again in a few moments.
registration-disabled: Registration is currently unavailable. Please contact our support team for assistance.
unexpected-login-response: We encountered an issue while signing you in. Please try again or contact support.
request-timeout-toast: Connection timed out. Please try again.
